Page Title: Fragmen Kisah Putra Rama & Rawana, Kropak 18 [15th century-16th century]
Description: Original title and creator are unknown. This incomplete manuscript contains a fragment of an Old Sundanese metric version of the Ramayana story; an edition and Indonesian translation has been published by Undang Darsa (2008) as Fragmen Kisah Putra Rama & Rawana (naskah lontar kropak 18), Seri Penerbitan 1 Koleksi Kabuyutan Ciburuy Garut. Garut: Dinas Pariwisata dan Kebudayaan Kabupaten Garut. Medium of original material: lontar; 5 leaves of four lines. Dimensions: 28.5 x 2.8 cm. Condition: the plywood case within which the lontar was stored until recent years is now missing.
